cards.title: Staring Competition
cards.description: Have a staring competition with the person in front of you, the loser must drink

cards.title: Only the Good Die Young
cards.description: The youngest player must drink

cards.title: Waht?
cards.description: If yuo cna raed tihs tehn dinrk

cards.title: Rich Kid
cards.description: The person who's been to the most countries must drink twice

cards.title: Group Joker
cards.description: Tell a joke and if anybody laughs, everyone must drink

cards.title: Rockstars
cards.description: Anyone who has ever dyed their hair must drink

cards.title: Turning a Blind Eye
cards.description: The next person who makes eye contact with you must drink

cards.title: 2 Turths, 1 Lie
cards.description:
You must tell 2 truths and 1 lie.
You don't have to say which one's the lie

cards.title: Double Up
cards.description: Anyone who drinks without being forced to has to drink again

cards.title: Generous Lovers
cards.description: Anybody who has ever "given head" must drink

cards.title: Dress to Impress
cards.description: Whoever is dressed best, they must drink

cards.title: BFFs forever
cards.description: High five the player to your right, take a selfie, then both drink

cards.title: How many colours?
cards.description:
Go round clockwise a circle and name a colour.
If you can't think of a colour or repeat one: you must drink

cards.title: Upside Down
cards.description:
Turn upside down on your seat and try your best to take a sip.
If you can't you have to drink twice

cards.title: Drink
cards.description: Just drink, it's as simple as that

cards.title: Job Interview
cards.description: Pick a person and pretend to interview for a job with them

cards.title: Our Drink
cards.description: Everyone is allow to contribute something to your drink

cards.title: No Smoking!
cards.description: If someone has already gone for a smoke break, they must drink

cards.title: Blackjack
cards.description: Starting with you going clockwise, every player must count up the previous?

cards.title: Pizza or Burger
cards.description:
Everyone choose which side they prefer, pizza or burgers
All players on the losing side must drink

cards.title: Truth or Dare
cards.description: Play one round of Truth or Dare

cards.title: Hands Free
cards.description: Take a tip without using your hands

cards.title: Swapsies
cards.description: Choose a player to phones with 30 seconds

cards.title: no nativo
cards.description: You can't speak your native language for the next round

cards.title: Cats or Dogs
cards.description:
Everyone vote if they prefer dogs or cats.
The side with the least votes must drink

cards.title: What's my name?
cards.description:
Try to remember the name of every other player.
Drink for every name you can't remember

cards.title: Most Kinky
cards.description: Whoever is voted most kinky has to drink

cards.title: Alcoholics
cards.description: Anyone drinking something stronger than 10% must drink

cards.title: The Floor is Lava
cards.description: You cannot touch the floor for the until the next round

cards.title: Hungry?
cards.description: The person who has gone the longest without eating must drink

cards.title: Take your Pick
cards.description: Your can take 1 sip from any player's drink

cards.title: Queens
cards.description: Anyone who isn't straight must drink

cards.title: Try Not to Blush
cards.description:
Go round clockwise naming porn catagory.
If you don't say one in 5 seconds say one said before, you must drink

cards.title: I Demand a Trial
cards.description:
You've been accused of murder!
The person on your left must defend you.
The person on the right convince everyone you did it.
Whoever fails to convince the rest of the group must drink 3 times

cards.title: Oooo
cards.description: Everyone vote on the person most likely to have a crush on someone else playing, they have to drink twice

cards.title: Getting Around
cards.description: The person that has sex most frequently must drink

cards.title: Shots!
cards.description: Pick a player to take a shot with you

cards.title: To Lost Love
cards.description: Everyone who would get back with their ex, take a shot together

cards.title: A tasting
cards.description: Take a drink from every player's drink

cards.title: Rekindling an Old Freindship
cards.description: Send a message to someone you haven't talked to in over a year

cards.title: Fuck fuck fuck
cards.description: Drink if you have ever sent a sexual message to the wrong person

cards.title: Your Darkest Desires
cards.description: What is your dream sexual encounter?

cards.title: Where do you stand?
cards.description: Are you a top, bottom or something inbetween?

cards.title: Where do you stand?
cards.description: Are you a top, bottom or something inbetween?

cards.title: Secret Santa
cards.description: The players on your left and right have one round to bring you a gift, winner is allowed to make someone drink

cards.title: Professional Seductress
cards.description: Attempt to suduce another player
